unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities News: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Spark Diwali Cheer!**
normalised: energy and utilities news: solar rooftop subsidies spark D E W A L I cheer!

unnormalised: Good news, folks! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy just announced some sweet deals on rooftop solar installations. Subsidies are back, and they're bigger than ever!
normalised: Good news, folks! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy just announced some sweet deals on rooftop solar installations. Subsidies are back, and they are bigger than ever!

unnormalised: Thinking of ditching those pesky power cuts this Diwali? Now's your chance! The government's offering up to 40% subsidy on solar panel installations for homes in places like Chennai, Mumbai and even smaller towns like Kozhikode!
normalised: Thinking of ditching those pesky power cuts this D E W A L I? Now is your chance! The government is offering up to forty percent subsidy on solar panel installations for homes in places like Chennai, Mumbai and even smaller towns like Kozhikode!

unnormalised: Imagine, powering your entire home, maybe even your AC, with sunshine! The scheme aims to bring down electricity bills for middle-class families, especially during the summer months when those bills can really sting.
normalised: Imagine, powering your entire home, maybe even your A C, with sunshine! The scheme aims to bring down electricity bills for middle-class families, especially during the summer months when those bills can really sting.

unnormalised: Under the Pradhan Mantri Surya Ghar Yojana, individual households can get subsidies on systems up to 3kW. Think of all the extra biryani you can cook with those savings!
normalised: Under the Pradhan Mantri Surya Ghar Yojana, individual households can get subsidies on systems up to three K W. Think of all the extra biryani you can cook with those savings!

unnormalised: Local DISCOMs like Tata Power and Adani Electricity are partnering to make the application process smoother than a Mysore Pak.
normalised: Local D I S C O M s like Tata Power and Adani Electricity are partnering to make the application process smoother than a Mysore Pak.

unnormalised: Remember to check the specific subsidy amounts available in your state, as they may vary.
normalised: Remember to check the specific subsidy amounts available in your state, as they may vary.

unnormalised: Don't delay; applications are rolling out NOW. Grab this opportunity and light up your Diwali with solar power!
normalised: Don't delay; applications are rolling out N O W. Grab this opportunity and light up your D I W A L I with solar power!
